panels.description: How many git syncs completed, partitioned by state (success, error, noop) & How many git fetches were run
panels.title: Git sync/fetch per minute

targets.expr:
sum(rate(git_sync_duration_seconds_count{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job"}[$__rate_interval])) by (status) /
sum(rate(git_sync_duration_seconds_sum{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job"}[$__rate_interval])) by (status)

panels.title: Phases of pods with git-sync sidecar
